explains: n. 赞扬，称赞；问候，祝贺
wordGroup: compliment someone on 称赞某人的…
left-handed compliment 言不由衷(或挖苦人)的恭维话

sentences.en: Don't be upset—I'm sure she meant it as a compliment.
sentences.cn: 别烦恼—我肯定她的原意是要称赞你的。

sentences.en: Saying she's improved comes over as a backhanded compliment.
sentences.cn: 说她进步了是一种挖苦的恭维话。

sentences.en: 'You were both wonderful!' 'So were you!' we said, returning the compliment.
sentences.cn: “你们俩太棒了！”“你也一样啊！”我们也称赞道。
